General.Name: Yonwoo Co. Ltd
General.Description: Yonwoo Co. Ltd, a packaging company, manufactures and sells cosmetic dispenser pumps for skin and personal care markets in Korea and internationally. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea. As of July 1, 2022, Yonwoo Co. Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Kolmar Korea Co., Ltd.
